section.title: SystemStudio Files and Folders
section.para: SystemStudio has several key files and folders, listed in the table below.

row.entry: SystemStudio looks for this file to locate openprovision configuration. See the openprovision and openprovision.conf man pages for more information. This file is optional and does not exist in the default SystemStudio installation.
Python code for SystemStudio, where $version is the Python version.
Documentation for SystemStudio, where $version is the SystemStudio version.
Relax NG schemas for distribution definition validation.
SystemStudio stores cached content in this folder. See the openprovision and openprovision.conf man pages for cache-related options.
SystemStudio publishes completed system distributions to this folder by default. An alternative location can be specified on a per-system-distribution basis within a distribution definition.
